bugs.title: 测试Bug - 新的问题示例
bugs.description:
这是一个测试添加的Bug记录
用于演示数据管理功能
bugs.steps:
1. 打开测试页面
2. 点击测试按钮
3. 观察错误现象

bugs.title: Recount function without RO, and auto authorized successful
bugs.description:
Device Management -> Click icon (right upper) -> Recount
login user has Device Management with recount access only, without RO access.
But the authorized successful automatically, and without insert RO U
bugs.steps: Device Management -> Click icon (right upper) -> Recount

bugs.title: Wording issue for "severs", it should be servers
bugs.description:
Initialisation popup window:
• 错误: Please confirm to execute data initialisation for all devices and severs
• 正确: Please confirm to execute data initialisation for all devices and servers
bugs.steps: Device Management -> Click icon (right upper) -> Data Initialisation

bugs.title: ECMS: Server error when Consolidation
bugs.description: Server error when select all subsectors to consolidate.
bugs.steps:
1. Election Result Management > Votes Consolidation > Select All Subsectors
2. Consolidate
3. "Server error" appear

bugs.title: ECMS: Error message when export User Audit Trial Report
bugs.description: User Audit Trial Report can't be exported and error message appear
bugs.steps:
1. System Management > Audit report management > User Audit Trial Report
2. Export
3. Error message appear

bugs.title: ECMS: Incorrect report title and No "Device no." data display
bugs.description:
• Batch message report: No "Device no." data display and report title is correct
• Batch scanning summary report: No "Device no." data display and report title is correct
bugs.steps:
1. System Management > Audit report management > Batch message report
2. System Management > Audit report management > Batch scanning summary report
bugs.note: 需要转设备端(标题已改,数据设备端未报)

bugs.title: ECMS: Some data still display as English after language change
bugs.description: The data of "Module" and Action name" still display as English in User Audit Trial Report after change application language to Traditional Chinese
bugs.steps:
1. Change application language to Traditional Chinese
2. System Management > Audit report management > User Audit Trial Report
3. Some data still display in English
bugs.note: 不是bug，待退回(设备端已沟通只支持英文)

bugs.title: ECMS: Batch data can't be shown after switch
bugs.description: Batch data can't be shown after switch between "All" and "Device number" in "Device no." under "Enquire Batch in VBIS"

bugs.title: ECMS - Close Counting - wording issue in Confirm message
bugs.description:
• 错误: ... These devices may not be able to start counting....
• 正确: ... These devices may not be able to Close counting....

bugs.title: ECMS: No data import from HSS0.5 & VBIS when use offline data recovery
bugs.description: During import data, it will show 100% imported but there is no data display on related subsector in progress monitoring
bugs.note: 需要转离线数据导入应用处理

transfer.label: 需要转移
transfer.description: 需要其他团队/人员处理
